00058    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00059    /*
00060    * Constructor.
00061    */
00062    McSimulation::McSimulation(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00063     : Simulation(communicator),
00064       system_(),
00065       mcMoveManagerPtr_(0),
00066       mcDiagnosticManagerPtr_(0),
00067       paramFilePtr_(0),
00068       isInitialized_(false),
00069       isRestarting_(false)
00070    {
00071       // Set connections between this McSimulation and child McSystem
00072       system().setId(0);
00073       system().setSimulation(*this);
00074       system().setFileMaster(fileMaster());
00075 
00076       // Create McMove and Diagnostic managers
00077       mcMoveManagerPtr_ = new McMoveManager(*this);
00078       mcDiagnosticManagerPtr_ = new McDiagnosticManager(*this);
00079 
00080       // Pass Manager<Diagnostic>* to Simulation base class.
00081       setDiagnosticManager(mcDiagnosticManagerPtr_);
00082    }
00083    #endif
00084 
00085    /*
00086    * Constructor.
00087    */
00088    McSimulation::McSimulation()
00089     : Simulation(),
00090       system_(),
00091       mcMoveManagerPtr_(0),
00092       mcDiagnosticManagerPtr_(0),
00093       paramFilePtr_(0),
00094       isInitialized_(false),
00095       isRestarting_(false)
00096    {
00097       // Set connections between this McSimulation and child McSystem
00098       system().setId(0);
00099       system().setSimulation(*this);
00100       system().setFileMaster(fileMaster());
00101 
00102       // Create McMove and Diagnostic managers
00103       mcMoveManagerPtr_ = new McMoveManager(*this);
00104       mcDiagnosticManagerPtr_ = new McDiagnosticManager(*this);
00105 
00106       // Pass Manager<Diagnostic>* to Simulation base class.
00107       setDiagnosticManager(mcDiagnosticManagerPtr_);
00108    }

00110    /*
00111    * Destructor.
00112    */
00113    McSimulation::~McSimulation()
00114    {
00115       delete mcMoveManagerPtr_;
00116       delete mcDiagnosticManagerPtr_;
00117    }

00119    /*
00120    * Process command line options.
00121    */
00122    void McSimulation::setOptions(int argc, char **argv)
00123    {
00124       char* rarg   = 0;
00125       bool  eflag  = false;
00126       bool  rflag  = false;
00127       #ifdef MCMD_PERTURB
00128       bool  pflag = false;
00129       #endif
00130    
00131       // Read program arguments
00132       int c;
00133       opterr = 0;
00134       while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "epr:")) != -1) {
00135          switch (c) {
00136          case 'e':
00137            eflag = true;
00138            break;
00139          case 'r':
00140            rflag = true;
00141            rarg  = optarg;
00142            break;
00143          #ifdef MCMD_PERTURB
00144          case 'p':
00145            pflag = true;
00146            break;
00147          #endif
00148          case '?':
00149            std::cout << "Unknown option -" << optopt << std::endl;
00150            UTIL_THROW("Invalid command line option");
00151          }
00152       }
00153    
00154       // Set flag to echo parameters as they are read.
00155       if (eflag) {
00156          Util::ParamComponent::setEcho(true);
00157       }
00158       #ifdef MCMD_PERTURB
00159       // Set to use a perturbation.
00160       if (pflag) {
00161    
00162          // Set to expect perturbation in the param file.
00163          system().setExpectPerturbation();
00164    
00165          #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00166          Util::Log::file() << "Set to read parameters from a single file" 
00167                            << std::endl;
00168          setParamCommunicator();
00169          #endif
00170    
00171       }
00172       #endif
00173       if (rflag) {
00174          std::cout << "Reading restart" << std::endl;
00175          std::cout << "Base file name " << std::string(rarg) << std::endl;
00176          isRestarting_ = true; 
00177          readRestart(std::string(rarg));
00178       }
00179    }
00180 
00181    /*
00182    * Read parameters from file.
00183    */
00184    void McSimulation::readParam(std::istream &in)
00185    {
00186       if (isRestarting_) {
00187          if (isInitialized_) {
00188             return;
00189          }
00190       } else 
00191       if (isInitialized_) {
00192          UTIL_THROW("Error: Called readParam when already initialized");
00193       }
00194 
00195       // Record identity of parameter file
00196       paramFilePtr_ = &in;
00197 
00198       readBegin(in,"McSimulation");
00199 
00200       // Read all species, diagnostics, random number seed
00201       Simulation::readParam(in);
00202 
00203       // Read the McSystem parameters: potential parameters, temperature etc.
00204       readParamComposite(in, system());
00205 
00206       // Read Monte Carlo Moves
00207       assert(mcMoveManagerPtr_);
00208       readParamComposite(in, *mcMoveManagerPtr_);
00209 
00210       // Read Diagnostics
00211       readParamComposite(in, diagnosticManager());
00212 
00213       isValid();
00214       isInitialized_ = true;
00215       readEnd(in);
00216    }
00217 
00218    /*
00219    * Read default parameter file.
00220    */
00221    void McSimulation::readParam()
00222    {  readParam(fileMaster().paramFile()); }
00223 
00224    /*
00225    * Read and execute commands from a specified command file.
00226    */
00227    void McSimulation::readCommands(std::istream &in)
00228    {
00229       if (!isInitialized_) {
00230          UTIL_THROW("McSimulation is not initialized");
00231       }
00232 
00233       std::string    command;
00234       std::string    filename;
00235       std::ifstream  inputFile;
00236       std::ofstream  outputFile;
00237 
00238       #ifndef UTIL_MPI
00239       std::istream&     inBuffer = in;
00240       #else
00241       std::stringstream inBuffer;
00242       std::string       line;
00243       #endif
00244 
00245       bool readNext = true;
00246       while (readNext) {
00247 
00248          // fdef   UTIL_MPI, read a line and copy to stringstream inBuffer
00249          // ifndef UTIL_MPI, inBuffer is simply a reference to istream in.
00250 
00251          #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00252          // Read a command line, and broadcast if necessary.
00253          if (!hasParamCommunicator() || isParamIoProcessor()) {
00254             getNextLine(in, line);
00255          }
00256          if (hasParamCommunicator()) {
00257             bcast<std::string>(communicator(), line, 0);
00258          }
00259 
00260          // Copy the command line to inBuffer.
00261          inBuffer.clear();
00262          for (unsigned i=0; i < line.size(); ++i) {
00263             inBuffer.put(line[i]);
00264          }
00265          #endif
00266 
00267          inBuffer >> command;
00268          Log::file() << command;
00269 
00270          if (isRestarting_) {
00271 
00272             if (command == "RESTART") {
00273                int endStep;
00274                inBuffer >> endStep;
00275                Log::file() << "  " << iStep_ << " to " 
00276                            << endStep << std::endl;
00277                simulate(endStep, isRestarting_);
00278                isRestarting_ = false;
00279             } else {
00280                UTIL_THROW("Missing RESTART command");
00281             }
00282 
00283          } else {
00284 
00285             if (command == "FINISH") {
00286                Log::file() << std::endl;
00287                readNext = false;
00288             } else
00289             if (command == "SET_CONFIG_IO") {
00290                std::string classname;
00291                inBuffer >> classname;
00292                Log::file() << Str(classname, 15) << std::endl;
00293                system().setConfigIo(classname);
00294             } else
00295             if (command == "READ_CONFIG") {
00296                inBuffer >> filename;
00297                Log::file() << Str(filename, 15) << std::endl;
00298                fileMaster().openInputFile(filename, inputFile);
00299                system().readConfig(inputFile);
00300                inputFile.close();
00301             } else
00302             if (command == "SIMULATE") {
00303                int endStep;
00304                inBuffer >> endStep;
00305                Log::file() << "  " << endStep << std::endl;
00306                bool isContinuation = false;
00307                simulate(endStep, isContinuation);
00308             } else
00309             if (command == "CONTINUE") {
00310                if (iStep_ == 0) {
00311                   UTIL_THROW("Attempt to continue when iStep_ == 0");
00312                }
00313                int endStep;
00314                inBuffer >> endStep;
00315                Log::file() << Int(endStep, 15) << std::endl;
00316                bool isContinuation = true;
00317                simulate(endStep, isContinuation);
00318             } else
00319             if (command == "ANALYZE_DUMPS") {
00320                int min, max;
00321                inBuffer >> min >> max >> filename;
00322                Log::file() << "  " <<  min << "  " <<  max
00323                            << "  " <<  filename << std::endl;
00324                analyze(min, max, filename);
00325             } else
00326             if (command == "WRITE_CONFIG") {
00327                inBuffer >> filename;
00328                Log::file() << Str(filename, 15) << std::endl;
00329                fileMaster().openOutputFile(filename, outputFile);
00330                system().writeConfig(outputFile);
00331                outputFile.close();
00332             } else
00333             if (command == "WRITE_PARAM") {
00334                inBuffer >> filename;
00335                Log::file() << "  " << filename << std::endl;
00336                fileMaster().openOutputFile(filename, outputFile);
00337                writeParam(outputFile);
00338                outputFile.close();
00339             } else 
00340             if (command == "GENERATE_MOLECULES") {
00341                DArray<double> ExclusionRadii;
00342                DArray<int>    capacities;
00343                ExclusionRadii.allocate(nAtomType());
00344                capacities.allocate(nSpecies());
00345 
00346                // Parse command
00347                inBuffer >> system().boundary();
00348                Log::file() << "  " << system().boundary();
00349                Label capacityLabel("Capacities:");
00350                inBuffer >> capacityLabel;
00351                for (int iSpecies = 0; iSpecies < nSpecies(); ++iSpecies) {
00352                   inBuffer >> capacities[iSpecies];
00353                   Log::file() << "  " << capacities[iSpecies];
00354                }
00355                Label radiusLabel("Radii:");
00356                inBuffer >> radiusLabel;
00357                for (int iType=0; iType < nAtomType(); iType++) {
00358                   inBuffer >> ExclusionRadii[iType];
00359                   Log::file() << "  " << ExclusionRadii[iType];
00360                }
00361                Log::file() << std::endl;
00362 
00363                for (int iSpecies = 0; iSpecies < nSpecies(); ++iSpecies) {
00364                   species(iSpecies).generateMolecules(
00365                      capacities[iSpecies], ExclusionRadii, system(),
00366                      &system().bondPotential(),
00367                      system().boundary());   
00368                }
00369 
00370                #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR 
00371                // Generate cell list
00372                system().pairPotential().buildCellList();
00373                #endif
00374 
00375             } else
00376             if (command == "DEFORM_CELL") {
00377                
00378                // Read in configuration from file
00379                inBuffer >> filename;
00380                Log::file() << Str(filename, 15) << std::endl;
00381                fileMaster().openInputFile(filename, inputFile);
00382                system().readConfig(inputFile);
00383                inputFile.close();
00384 
00385                System::MoleculeIterator molIter;
00386                Molecule::AtomIterator atomIter;
00387                for (int iSpec=0; iSpec < nSpecies(); ++iSpec) {
00388                   system().begin(iSpec, molIter);
00389                   for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00390                      molIter->begin(atomIter);
00391                      for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00392                         Vector cartPosition, genPosition;
00393                         cartPosition = atomIter->position();
00394                         system().boundary().transformCartToGen(cartPosition, genPosition);
00395                         atomIter->position() = genPosition;
00396                      }
00397                   }
00398                }
00399 
00400                // Read in new boundary
00401                inBuffer >> system().boundary();
00402                Log::file() << "  " << system().boundary();
00403                Log::file() << std::endl;
00404 
00405                for (int iSpec=0; iSpec < nSpecies(); ++iSpec) {
00406                   system().begin(iSpec, molIter);
00407                   for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00408                      molIter->begin(atomIter);
00409                      for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00410                         Vector cartPosition, genPosition;
00411                         genPosition = atomIter->position();
00412                         system().boundary().transformGenToCart(genPosition, cartPosition);
00413                         atomIter->position() = cartPosition;
00414                      }
00415                   }
00416                }
00417 
00418                // Write out configuration to file
00419                inBuffer >> filename;
00420                Log::file() << Str(filename, 15) << std::endl;
00421                fileMaster().openOutputFile(filename, outputFile);
00422                system().writeConfig(outputFile);
00423                outputFile.close();
00424 
00425                #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR 
00426                // Generate cell list
00427                system().pairPotential().buildCellList();
00428                #endif
00429 
00430             } else
00431             #ifndef UTIL_MPI
00432             if (command == "SET_PAIR") {
00433                std::string paramName;
00434                int typeId1, typeId2; 
00435                double value;
00436                inBuffer >> paramName >> typeId1 >> typeId2 >> value;
00437                Log::file() << "  " <<  paramName 
00438                            << "  " <<  typeId1 << "  " <<  typeId2
00439                            << "  " <<  value << std::endl;
00440                system().pairPotential()
00441                        .set(paramName, typeId1, typeId2, value);
00442             } else 
00443             if (command == "SET_BOND") {
00444                std::string paramName;
00445                int typeId; 
00446                double value;
00447                inBuffer >> paramName >> typeId >> value;
00448                Log::file() << "  " <<  paramName << "  " <<  typeId 
00449                            << "  " <<  value << std::endl;
00450                system().bondPotential().set(paramName, typeId, value);
00451             } else 
00452             #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00453             if (command == "SET_ANGLE") {
00454                std::string paramName;
00455                int typeId; 
00456                double value;
00457                inBuffer >> paramName >> typeId >> value;
00458                Log::file() << "  " <<  paramName << "  " <<  typeId 
00459                            << "  " <<  value << std::endl;
00460                system().anglePotential().set(paramName, typeId, value);
00461             } else 
00462             #endif
00463             #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00464             if (command == "SET_DIHEDRAL") {
00465                std::string paramName;
00466                int typeId; 
00467                double value;
00468                inBuffer >> paramName >> typeId >> value;
00469                Log::file() << "  " <<  paramName << "  " <<  typeId 
00470                            << "  " <<  value << std::endl;
00471                system().dihedralPotential().set(paramName, typeId, value);
00472             } else 
00473             #endif
00474             #endif
00475             {
00476                Log::file() << "  Error: Unknown command  " << std::endl;
00477                readNext = false;
00478             }
00479 
00480          }
00481       }
00482    }
00483 
00484    /*
00485    * Read and execute commands from the default command file.
00486    */
00487    void McSimulation::readCommands()
00488    {  readCommands(fileMaster().commandFile()); }
00489 
00490    /*
00491    * Run this MC simulation.
00492    */
00493    void McSimulation::simulate(int endStep, bool isContinuation)
00494    {
00495       if (!isInitialized_) {
00496          UTIL_THROW("McSimulation not initialized");
00497       }
00498 
00499       if (isContinuation) {
00500          Log::file() << "Restarting from iStep = " << iStep_ << std::endl;
00501       } else {
00502          iStep_ = 0;
00503          diagnosticManager().setup();
00504          mcMoveManagerPtr_->setup();
00505       }
00506       int beginStep = iStep_;
00507       int nStep = endStep - beginStep;
00508       Log::file() << std::endl;
00509 
00510       // Main Monte Carlo loop
00511       Timer timer;
00512       timer.start();
00513       for ( ; iStep_ < endStep; ++iStep_) {
00514 
00515          // Sample diagnostics
00516          if (Diagnostic::baseInterval > 0) {
00517             if (iStep_ % Diagnostic::baseInterval == 0) {
00518                diagnosticManager().sample(iStep_);
00519             }
00520          }
00521 
00522          // Choose and attempt an McMove
00523          mcMoveManagerPtr_->chooseMove().move();
00524 
00525          #ifdef MCMD_PERTURB
00526          #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00527          // Attempt replica move, if any.
00528          if (system().hasPerturbation()) {
00529             if (system().hasReplicaMove()) {
00530                if (system().replicaMove().isAtInterval(iStep_)) {
00531                   bool success = system().replicaMove().move();
00532                   #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00533                   if (success) {
00534                      system().pairPotential().buildCellList();
00535                   }
00536                   #endif
00537                }
00538             }
00539          }
00540          #endif
00541          #endif
00542 
00543       }
00544       timer.stop();
00545       double time = timer.time();
00546 
00547       // Final diagnostic sample
00548       assert(iStep_ == endStep);
00549       if (Diagnostic::baseInterval > 0) {
00550          if (iStep_ % Diagnostic::baseInterval == 0) {
00551             diagnosticManager().sample(iStep_);
00552          }
00553       }
00554 
00555       // Output results of all diagnostics to output files
00556       diagnosticManager().output();
00557 
00558       // Output results of move statistics to files
00559       mcMoveManagerPtr_->output();
00560 
00561       // Output time for the run
00562       Log::file() << std::endl;
00563       Log::file() << "endStep       " << endStep << std::endl;
00564       Log::file() << "nStep         " << nStep << std::endl;
00565       Log::file() << "run time      " << time
00566                   << " sec" << std::endl;
00567       double rStep = double(nStep);
00568       Log::file() << "time / nStep  " <<  time / rStep
00569                   << " sec" << std::endl;
00570       Log::file() << std::endl;
00571 
00572       // Print McMove acceptance statistics
00573       long attempt;
00574       long accept;
00575       using namespace std;
00576       Log::file() << "Move Statistics:" << endl << endl;
00577       Log::file() << setw(32) << left <<  "Move Name"
00578            << setw(12) << right << "Attempted"
00579            << setw(12) << right << "Accepted"
00580            << setw(15) << right << "AcceptRate"
00581            << endl;
00582       int nMove = mcMoveManagerPtr_->size();
00583       for (int iMove = 0; iMove < nMove; ++iMove) {
00584          attempt = (*mcMoveManagerPtr_)[iMove].nAttempt();
00585          accept  = (*mcMoveManagerPtr_)[iMove].nAccept();
00586          Log::file() << setw(32) << left 
00587               << mcMoveManagerPtr_->className(iMove)
00588               << setw(12) << right << attempt
00589               << setw(12) << accept
00590               << setw(15) << fixed << setprecision(6)
00591               << ( attempt == 0 ? 0.0 : double(accept)/double(attempt) )
00592               << endl;
00593       }
00594       Log::file() << endl;
00595 
00596       #ifdef MCMD_PERTURB
00597       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00598       // Print replica-exchange acceptance statistics
00599       if (system().hasPerturbation()) {
00600          if (system().hasReplicaMove()) {
00601   
00602             double ratio; 
00603             int    nAttempt, nAccept;
00604    
00605             nAttempt = system().replicaMove().nAttempt();
00606             nAccept = system().replicaMove().nAccept();
00607             ratio = nAttempt == 0 ? 0.0 : double(nAccept)/double(nAttempt);
00608             Log::file() << "Replica Exchange "
00609                         << Int(nAttempt) << Int(nAccept) << Dbl(ratio)
00610                         << std::endl;
00611          }
00612       }
00613       #endif
00614       #endif
00615 
00616    }
00617 
00618    /*
00619    * Read and analyze a sequence of configuration files.
00620    */
00621    void McSimulation::analyze(int min, int max, std::string dumpPrefix)
00622    {
00623       // Preconditions
00624       if (min < 0)    UTIL_THROW("min < 0");
00625       if (max < min)  UTIL_THROW("max < min");
00626 
00627       Timer             timer;
00628       std::string       filename;
00629       std::stringstream indexString;
00630       std::ifstream     configFile;
00631       int               nConfig;
00632       nConfig = max - min + 1;
00633 
00634       // Main loop
00635       Log::file() << "begin main loop" << std::endl;
00636       timer.start();
00637       for (iStep_ = min; iStep_ <= max; ++iStep_) {
00638 
00639          indexString << iStep_;
00640          filename = dumpPrefix;
00641          filename += indexString.str();
00642          fileMaster().openInputFile(filename, configFile);
00643 
00644          // Clear the stringstream
00645          indexString.str("");
00646 
00647          system().readConfig(configFile);
00648          configFile.close();
00649 
00650          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00651          // Build the system CellList
00652          system().pairPotential().buildCellList();
00653          #endif
00654 
00655          #ifdef UTIL_DEBUG
00656          isValid();
00657          #endif
00658 
00659          // Initialize diagnostics (taking in molecular information).
00660          if (iStep_ == min) diagnosticManager().setup();
00661 
00662          // Sample property values
00663          diagnosticManager().sample(iStep_);
00664 
00665          // Clear out the System for the next readConfig.
00666          system().removeAllMolecules();
00667 
00668       }
00669       timer.stop();
00670       Log::file() << "end main loop" << std::endl;
00671 
00672       // Output results of all diagnostics to output files
00673       diagnosticManager().output();
00674 
00675       // Output time
00676       Log::file() << std::endl;
00677       Log::file() << "nConfig       " << nConfig << std::endl;
00678       Log::file() << "run time      " << timer.time()
00679                   << "  sec" << std::endl;
00680       Log::file() << "time / config " << timer.time()/double(nConfig)
00681                   << "  sec" << std::endl;
00682       Log::file() << std::endl;
00683 
00684       iStep_ = 0;
00685    }
00686 
00687    void McSimulation::writeRestart(const std::string& filename)
00688    {
00689       std::ofstream out;
00690       fileMaster().openParamOFile(filename, ".prm", out);
00691       writeParam(out);
00692       out.close();
00693 
00694       fileMaster().openRestartOFile(filename, ".rst", out);
00695       Serializable::OArchiveType ar;
00696       ar.setStream(out);
00697       ar & random();
00698       ar & system();
00699       ar & iStep_;
00700       mcMoveManagerPtr_->save(ar);
00701       mcDiagnosticManagerPtr_->save(ar);
00702       out.close();
00703    }
00704 
00705    void McSimulation::readRestart(const std::string& filename)
00706    {
00707       if (isInitialized_) {
00708          UTIL_THROW("Error: Called readRestart when already initialized");
00709       }
00710       if (!isRestarting_) {
00711          UTIL_THROW("Error: Called readRestart without restart option");
00712       }
00713 
00714       // Open and read parameter (*.prm) file
00715       std::ifstream in;
00716       fileMaster().openParamIFile(filename, ".prm", in);
00717       readParam(in);
00718       in.close();
00719 
00720       // Open restart (*.rst) file and associate with an archive
00721       fileMaster().openRestartIFile(filename, ".rst", in);
00722       Serializable::IArchiveType ar;
00723       ar.setStream(in);
00724 
00725       // Load state from restart file
00726       ar & random();
00727       system().load(ar);
00728       ar & iStep_;
00729       mcMoveManagerPtr_->load(ar);
00730       mcDiagnosticManagerPtr_->load(ar);
00731       in.close();
00732 
00733       std::string commandFileName = filename + ".cmd";
00734       fileMaster().setCommandFileName(commandFileName);
00735       //fileMaster().openParamIFile(filename, ".cmd", in);
00736       //readCommands(in);
00737       //in.close();
00738    }
00739 
00740    /*
00741    * Get the McMove factory.
00742    */
00743    Factory<McMove>& McSimulation::mcMoveFactory()
00744    {  return mcMoveManagerPtr_->factory(); }
00745 
00746    /*
00747    * Check validity: return true if valid, or throw Exception.
00748    */
00749    bool McSimulation::isValid() const
00750    {
00751       Simulation::isValid();
00752       system().isValid();
00753 
00754       if (&system().simulation() != this) {
00755          UTIL_THROW("Invalid pointer to Simulation in System");
00756       }
00757 
00758       return true;
00759    }
